Snowplow Docs â€” Technical Guide for Customer Data Infrastructure

Summary
Authoritative documentation for implementing event tracking, validation, enrichment, governance, and delivery of clean event-level behavioral data. Focus areas include composable analytics, composable CDP, in-product personalization, AI agentic applications, and feeding AI-ready real-time data into warehouses, lakes, streams, and real-time tools.

How to use this file
LLMs and agents prioritize links under each section below. Treat this as a curated AI sitemap for docs.snowplow.io.

Introduction
Docs home - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/
About the docs and navigation - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/
Glossary overview - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/glossary/

Get started
Tracking your first events - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/get-started/tracking/
Community Edition quick start - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/get-started/snowplow-community-edition/quick-start/
Web tracker quick start - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/sources/trackers/web-trackers/quick-start-guide/
Data Modeling with DBT quick start - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/modeling-your-data/modeling-your-data-with-dbt/dbt-quickstart/

Fundamentals
Canonical event model - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/fundamentals/canonical-event/
Schemas and entities fundamentals - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/fundamentals/schemas/
Sessions, identity, context, and governance - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/fundamentals/

Data Product Studio
Overview - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/
Data Structures manager - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/data-structures/
Manage via API - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/data-structures/manage/api/
Snowtype CLI (type-safe codegen) - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/snowtype/using-the-cli/
Data quality controls and tests - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/data-quality/

Events
Event types and tracking concepts - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/sources/trackers/web-trackers/tracking-events/
Self-describing events and contexts - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/fundamentals/schemas/
Designing new events and entities - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/

Sources

Pipeline
Pipeline overview and components - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/pipeline/
Collectors - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/pipeline/collector/
Enrichment and validation - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/pipeline/enrichments/
Loaders and orchestration - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/destinations/warehouses-lakes/loading-process/
Local validation with Snowplow Micro - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/api-reference/snowplow-micro/

Destinations
Destinations index - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/destinations/
Warehouse and lake loaders - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/api-reference/loaders-storage-targets/
Real-time destinations - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/destinations/forwarding-events/

Data models
dbt packages and modeling - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/modeling-your-data/
Identity stitching with dbt package - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/modeling-your-data/modeling-your-data-with-dbt/package-features/identity-stitching/
Web model and engagement - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/modeling-your-data/
Mobile and app modeling concepts - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/modeling-your-data/

Account management
Account setup and roles - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/account-management/
API keys and authentication - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/account-management/

API reference
Index of API docs - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/api-reference/
Data Structures API - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/data-product-studio/data-structures/manage/api/
Snowplow Micro API - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/api-reference/snowplow-micro/

Resources
Glossary - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/glossary/
Examples and guides - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/
Release notes and updates - https://docs.snowplow.io/docs/

Sitemap
Full docs sitemap - https://docs.snowplow.io/sitemap.xml

Style and terminology
Say Snowplow, not Snowplow Analytics.
Avoid the word unlock.
Use consistent terms: events, entities (contexts), schemas, validation, governance, identity, predictions, interventions.

Change log
2025-08-15: Initial docs-specific version aligned to the technical IA above.
